This will equip police, fire, and public works depts with an interoperable communications network, which will boost coordination & safety.

This lack of infrastructure has prevented the development of a 71-acre area in the town‚Äôs Economic Growth Overlay District.

This will provide space for older adults and community members to gather, socialize, and access essential services and assistance.

The Town of Cumberland will receive $1.2M to address chronic stormwater drainage issues in its largest industrial park.

This project will protect infrastructure, prevent business disruptions, and preserve water and environmental quality.

The Town of Bristol will receive $1.2+ million to rehab or replace 11,500 feet of old sewer pipes & manholes.

With more than half of the system between 31 and 50 years old, fixing these failing pipes will help ensure safe wastewater management for residents and businesses.

¬†
A seemingly simple statement, it captured a recognition that the Congress should honor its highest ideals, not its narrowest interests.

Speaker Pelosi‚Äôs ensuing scramble to squeeze every partisan advantage right up to the last moment before a Republican majority takes over should inspire voters to wait a very long time before considering returning her team to power.

The Federal Reserve was founded on this day in 1913. It is now 109 years old and yet it has still never had a Latino serving as a regional Bank President. 

I won't stop calling attention to this until Latinos finally have a voice at the highest echelons of the Fed‚Äôs leadership.

But each time I've done it, I've gazed up, grasped the desk in front of me, and remembered I was standing at the central point of our Democracy -- the very spot where FDR marked the "day that will live in infamy," where LBJ declared "we shall overcome." What an honor it has been.
